00028 Predator* TestEnvironment::createPredator(const string& type, const string& name, const hgeVector& pos)
00029 {
00030     if (predators.find(name) == predators.end())
00031     {
00032         if (type == "Test")
00033         {
00034             predators[name] = new Predator(name, "Test Predator");
00035             Predator* pred = predators[name];
00036             pred->setBehaviorFamily("Ambush");
00037             pred->setBehaviorState(PASSIVE);
00038             pred->setHungerTime(500);
00039             pred->setStarvationTime(1000);
00040             pred->setSpeed(60);
00041             pred->setCamoflauge(.2);
00042             pred->setStealth(.5);
00043             pred->setWeight(50);
00044             pred->setHearingDistance(300);
00045             pred->setSightAngle(60);
00046             pred->setSightDistance(450);
00047             pred->setMaxAttackDistance(75);
00048             pred->setPosition(pos);
00049 
00050             pred->constructRenderables("TestPredator", "PredatorPointer", hgeColor(0.2, 0.2, 1.0, 0.8), hgeColor(1, 0, 0, 1));
00051             return pred;
00052         }
00053         else
00054         {
00055             Utils::get()->writeFormattedToLog("Environment [%s] does not handle Predator type [%s], returning NULL.", true, getType().c_str(), type.c_str());
00056             return NULL;
00057         }
00058     }
00059     else
00060     {
00061         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Predator with name [" + name + "] already exists, returning the previously existing Predator.");
00062         return predators[name];
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 Prey* TestEnvironment::createPrey(const string& type, const string& name, const hgeVector& pos)
00067 {
00068     if (prey.find(name) == prey.end())
00069     {
00070         if (type == "Test")
00071         {
00072             prey[name] = new Prey(name, "Test prey");
00073             Prey* animal = prey[name];
00074             animal->setBehaviorFamily("Generic");
00075             animal->setBehaviorState(PASSIVE);
00076             animal->setSpeed(35);
00077             animal->setCamoflauge(.5);
00078             animal->setStealth(.2);
00079             animal->setWeight(50);
00080             animal->setHearingDistance(300);
00081             animal->setSightAngle(60);
00082             animal->setSightDistance(450);
00083             animal->setPosition(pos);
00084 
00085             animal->constructRenderables("TestPrey", "PreyPointer", hgeColor(0.2, 1.0, .2, 0.8), hgeColor(1, 1, 0, 1));
00086             return animal;
00087         }
00088         else
00089         {
00090             Utils::get()->writeFormattedToLog("Environment [%s] does not handle Prey type [%s], returning NULL.", true, getType().c_str(), type.c_str());
00091             return NULL;
00092         }
00093     }
00094     else
00095     {
00096         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Prey with name [" + name + "] already exists, returning the previously existing Prey.");
00097         return prey[name];
00098     }
00099 }
